mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore showing a family The Capitol magazine
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch Moore, Jr. showing an unidentified family a magazine or pamphlet titled, "The Capitol." This photograph has been cut, most likely for the Congressman's newsletter. The Capitol Building can be seen in the background.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: GovernorsWest Virginia
LegislatorsUnited States
Moore, Arch A, Jr (Arch Alfred), 19232015
